itemsArr.title: Raised Button
itemsArr.description: A typically rectangular material button that lifts and displays ink reactions on press.

itemsArr.title: Flat Button
itemsArr.description: A button made of ink that displays ink reactions on press but does not lift.

itemsArr.title: Floating Action Button
itemsArr.description: Floating action buttons are used for a promoted action.

itemsArr.title: CardView
itemsArr.description: A card is a piece of paper with unique related data that serves as an entry point to more detailed information.

itemsArr.title: No Title
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Alerts
itemsArr.description: Alerts are urgent interruptions, requiring acknowledgement, that inform the user about a situation.

itemsArr.title: Confirmation dialogs
itemsArr.description: Confirmation dialogs require users to explicitly confirm their choice before an option is committed.

itemsArr.title: Full-screen dialogs
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Menu
itemsArr.description: Menus allow users to take an action by selecting from a list of choices revealed upon opening a temporary, new sheet of material.

itemsArr.title: Styled Menu
itemsArr.description: Menus allow users to take an action by selecting from a list of choices revealed upon opening a temporary, new sheet of material.

itemsArr.title: Picker
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Circular Progress
itemsArr.description: Minimize visual changes that occur while your app loads content by representing each operation with a single activity indicator.

itemsArr.title: Linear Progress
itemsArr.description: A linear progress indicator should always fill from 0 to 100 and never decrease in value.

itemsArr.title: Swipe down to refresh
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Scroll up to load more
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Check Box
itemsArr.description: Checkboxes allow the user to select multiple options from a set.

itemsArr.title: Radio Button
itemsArr.description: Radio buttons allow the user to select one option from a set.

itemsArr.title: Switch
itemsArr.description: On/off switches toggle the state of a single settings option.

itemsArr.title: Continuous slider
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Discrete slider
itemsArr.description: No Description

itemsArr.title: Snack Bar
itemsArr.description: Snackbars provide lightweight feedback about an operation by showing a brief message at the bottom of the screen.

itemsArr.title: Toast
itemsArr.description: Toasts are similar to snackbars but do not contain actions and cannot be swiped off screen.

itemsArr.title: Text only
itemsArr.description: Tabs make it easy to explore and switch between different views or functional aspects of an app or to browse categorized data sets.

itemsArr.title: Icons only
itemsArr.description: Tabs make it easy to explore and switch between different views or functional aspects of an app or to browse categorized data sets.

itemsArr.title: Icons and Text
itemsArr.description: Tabs make it easy to explore and switch between different views or functional aspects of an app or to browse categorized data sets.

itemsArr.title: Styled
itemsArr.description: Tabs make it easy to explore and switch between different views or functional aspects of an app or to browse categorized data sets.

itemsArr.title: Text field
itemsArr.description: Text fields allow the user to input text, select text (cut, copy, paste), and lookup data via auto-completion.

itemsArr.title: Single-line text field
itemsArr.description: Single-line fields automatically scroll their content to the left as the text input cursor reaches the right edge of the input field.

itemsArr.title: Multi-line text field
itemsArr.description: Multi-line text fields automatically break to a new line for overflow text and scroll vertically when the cursor reaches the lower edge.

itemsArr.title: Full-width text field
itemsArr.description: Full-width text fields are useful for more in-depth tasks.

itemsArr.title: Floating labels
itemsArr.description: When the user engages with the text input field, the floating inline labels move to float above the field.

itemsArr.title: User input errors
itemsArr.description: Help users fix input errors as soon as they are detected. Disable the submission of a form if errors are detected, and if detected only after form submission, clearly explain the error and how to fix it.

itemsArr.title: Default Toolbar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.

itemsArr.title: Styled Toolbar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.

itemsArr.title: Icons Toolbar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.

itemsArr.title: Back Toolbar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.

itemsArr.title: Blank Toolbar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.

itemsArr.title: App colors
itemsArr.description: Material appcompat provide usefule color attributes.

itemsArr.title: Rating Bar
itemsArr.description: Toolbars appear a step above the sheet of paper affected by their actions.
